fields_of_interest: Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: We have had minimum involvement in previous EU initiatives or consultations, and have only contributed to the following so far: "Public consultation on the regulatory environment for platforms, online intermediaries, data and cloud computing and the collaborative economy"
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Our aim is to democratize publishing on the web. We seek to achieve this through the provision and operation of the WordPress.com online platform, and associated products and services.
